price: 41. Inaan ku beddelno (kuwo kale) oo ka wanaagsan; nalagamana adkaado.
arabic: عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ خَيۡرٗا مِّنۡهُمۡ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَسۡبُوقِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: ʿalā an nubaddila khayran min'hum wamā naḥnu bimasbūqīna
